title: Chased
description: I’m filthy rich … and ruthless.I live for the hunt. The chase.My desires aren’t exactly normal.But neither is she … The girl I bought.She’s innocent and blind.Perfect for all my wicked needs.Perfect to prove just how far I’m willing to go.But there’s just one problem …I’m falling for her. Deep. Hard. Fast.Even though I’m the bad guy. The man who keeps her locked away.I’ll do anything to make her stay.One thing’s for sure … She will be  mine.WARNING: This book contains very disturbing content that may be offensive to readers.
author: Clarissa Wild
